name: Masquerade Mystery VR
description:
You walk into a masquerade dance party, just before the costume contest is about to begin! Talk to the party people, and answer their personality type questions to determine what costume you wore to the masquerade! There are six possible outcomes. Who will you be? Try it today!

*Designed for the Oculus Rift CV1.
